Reviews.Title: “rome in february”
Reviews.Author: rafaell0
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel five days enjoyed found condition breakfast tasty especially coffee selection bread sweets meat hotel city centre conected centre metro line five minutes walk hotel metro station cornelia five minutes walk bus station conected fiumicino airport clean warm bed confortable price reasonable bad experience reception staff polite staying hotel happy recommend hotel visitors rome

Reviews.Content: booked 12 waldorf bh found nice modern clean friendly efficient breakfast bar onsite decent reasonable restaurant corner transportation hotel can’t close metro understand close considering hotel value don becky

Reviews.Title: “Great value and clean”
Reviews.Author: Louise K
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel july 2011 loved minute hotel slightly centre rome peak summer hired scooter actually weekend stayed 3 nights paid £140 included breakfast hotel value money secure parking scooter round hotel hotel staff couldnt top floor fantastic bathroom thats expected european city huge balcony lovely sit warm clean breakfast bit dont mind staying 10 minutes centre value money recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Stayment in Rome”

Reviews.Content: hotel clean comfortable service includes breakfast pretty decent close downtown subway takes 20 minutes vatican 25 minutes fontana di trevi time subway worth hotel located 5 minutes cornelia station compared hotels italy american style hotel speak english spanish price decent comment rate pls thanks

Reviews.Title: “Not in a "Safe Location", as guaranteed by staff”
